name: Timothy Brits
bio: Developer and humanitarian advocate in Pretoria. I raise awareness about crises affecting Palestine and Ukraine and broader challenges across the Global South, and share practical ways people can help.

links.title: ShareTheMeal
links.description: A UN World Food Programme initiative that lets you donate meals to children and families in crisis with just one tap.

links.title: WaterAid
links.description: An international non-profit working to make clean water, decent toilets, and good hygiene normal for everyone, everywhere.
